channel.title: EtherealPK [317][PVP/PVM][Economy]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://etherealpk.com/Forums/images/gZe-Style/gZe-Style/images/logo.png[/img]
Forums- http://etherealpk.com/Forums/
Webclient- http://etherealpk.com/Forums/Play.php
Voting- http://etherealpk.com/Vote/#?step=1
Downloadable Client- https://www.dropbox.com/s/oobz05t43i94h42/Client.jar
[SIZE=3]What is EtherealPK? We are a private server community as the rest of everyone here ofcourse but we believe that we strive for the players suggestions and opinions for a great gameplay. We've listened and done what they've told us and how they want it.
Why we do what the players say? That is possibly the easiest thing to answer, it's the players that play and wants to have fun while playing also. That's why we do what they want as it's all for them.
Features:
- Skills Melee skills works properly Runecrafting with all altars working (multiple runes etc) Agility with gnome and barbarian course Herblore with correct potion creation and herb cleaning Agility with npc pickpocketing and stalls Crafting with gems, tanning, hide creation Fletching with all bows/cbows etc working correctly Slayer with tasks according to slayer level Mining with perfect timers and all ores mineable, prospectable Smithing with interface and creation, jewelry creation also works Fishing with fishes from shrimps to rocktails Cooking with fishes from shrimps to rocktails Firemaking which is clipped and with ashes Woodcutting with perfected timers Farming with raking, dibbing, watering and picking
- Player Killing Various known PKing areas put into simple teleports Great fast switching! PK point shop! Custom items for pking!
- Minigaming Staking Arena, use to fight for fun or bet in a stake Fight Caves to obtain firecape-kil'n cape Pest control Barrows
- Bosses Ice Queen Lair Godwars working fully Giant Mole Steel Dragons King Black Dragon Dagonnoth Kings Chaos Elemental
- Newer set of items, maps and npcs for those who also likes he higher revisions
- Misc Vote4Items Clanchat Custom items Voting Point Shop Great Staff
- More in store, and much more to come![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/7041/gpvl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/7924/tkbt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RYNuwxE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LPWMuTy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/579/s4oz.png[/img][/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.title: EtherealPK [317][PVP/PVM][Economy]
item.dc:creator: @xxbwxx xxbwxx
item.description:
@xxbwxx wrote:

[CENTER]

Forums- http://etherealpk.com/Forums/

Webclient- http://etherealpk.com/Forums/Play.php

Voting- http://etherealpk.com/Vote/#?step=1

Downloadable Client- https://www.dropbox.com/s/oobz05t43i94h42/Client.jar

[SIZE=3]What is EtherealPK?
We are a private server community as the rest of everyone here ofcourse
but we believe that we strive for the players suggestions and opinions for a great gameplay.
We’ve listened and done what they’ve told us and how they want it.

Why we do what the players say?
That is possibly the easiest thing to answer, it’s the players that play and wants to have fun while playing also.
That’s why we do what they want as it’s all for them.

Features:

  • Skills
    Melee skills works properly
    Runecrafting with all altars working (multiple runes etc)
    Agility with gnome and barbarian course
    Herblore with correct potion creation and herb cleaning
    Agility with npc pickpocketing and stalls
    Crafting with gems, tanning, hide creation
    Fletching with all bows/cbows etc working correctly
    Slayer with tasks according to slayer level
    Mining with perfect timers and all ores mineable, prospectable
    Smithing with interface and creation, jewelry creation also works
    Fishing with fishes from shrimps to rocktails
    Cooking with fishes from shrimps to rocktails
    Firemaking which is clipped and with ashes
    Woodcutting with perfected timers
    Farming with raking, dibbing, watering and picking

  • Player Killing
    Various known PKing areas put into simple teleports
    Great fast switching!
    PK point shop!
    Custom items for pking!

  • Minigaming
    Staking Arena, use to fight for fun or bet in a stake
    Fight Caves to obtain firecape-kil’n cape
    Pest control
    Barrows

  • Bosses
    Ice Queen Lair
    Godwars working fully
    Giant Mole
    Steel Dragons
    King Black Dragon
    Dagonnoth Kings
    Chaos Elemental

  • Newer set of items, maps and npcs for those who also likes he higher revisions

  • Misc
    Vote4Items
    Clanchat
    Custom items
    Voting Point Shop
    Great Staff

  • More in store, and much more to come![/SIZE]

[/SPOILER][/CENTER]
